body.name: Memory Foam Cervical Pillows for Neck & Shoulder Pain Relief,Ergonomic Neck Support Pillow for Side Back&Stomach Sleepers with Pillowcase,Contour Best Bed Anti-Snoring Pillows for Sleeping
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 12 mins
features: 😴【QUALITY SLEEP STARTS WITH A GOOD PILLOW】Are you always waking up with neck cramps or back pain? Our proven ergonomically designed, contoured memory foam pillow supports your head, neck, shoulders and back perfectly.Conform to the natural curve of your body, optimize air passage and reduce snoring. When you wake up, you will feel refreshed, and any neck pain you suffered before should disappear over time.

😴【100% PREMIUM SLOW REBOUND MEMORY FOAM】 : The Cervical neck pillow is made of high-density, slow-rebound and odorless memory foam, which will automatically shape when pressed hard, and will rebound within 5 s when not pressed.The memory foam pillow core is soft and comfortable, and can adjust its shape according to the sleeping postures, non-deformation throughout the year. With the design of water wave bulge, the neck pain relief pillow will not press the auricle like other ordinary pillows.

😴【BREATHABLE & REMOVABLE PILLOWCASE】:JIAAO neck pain relief pillow has double layers of high quality pillowcases ,The outer pillowcase is made from cotton and polyester, removable and machine washable,pillowcase fits perfectly against the skin, which retains moisture absorbing qualities to leave you from night sweat in a comfortable climate.The breathable inner cover protects the memory foam from being torn while adjusting the pillow for stomach sleeper, which can effectively extend the life of the memory foam core.

😴【 2 PERSONALIZED NECK PILLOW HEIGHTS】: When you are still troubled about not finding the right height pillow? JIAAO Neck Cervical Pillow Size 24.8"L * 14.17"W * 5.11"H, Just rotate the memory foam pillow to enjoy different heights (2.36"H). No matter what sleeping position you prefer, it provides you with a comfortable supportive neck and shoulder pain relief.

😴【Best Gift Choice】:The JIAAO brand has been on the market for many years and has developed pillows that have helped many people sleep comfortably through the night. That's why the JIAAO Side Sleeping Neck Pillow is absolutely perfect for a gift for your favorite person. If you have any dissatisfaction with the neck pillow, please feel free to contact us. We will provide 24 months worry-free product and friendly customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BETTER THAN A PILLOW
reviews.reviewText: IT HAS LESSENED MY NECK PAIN

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: Been sleeping on it for a week now and so far, it has been working as advertised. Soft memory foam but doesn't compress completely under the weight of my head. No neck pain from and I toss from side to side and back sleeping/snoring lol. I only wish it was about 2" thicker since I have fairly wide shoulders so side sleeping is a little off but like I said no neck pain so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this pillow because I tend to toss and turn, but mostly end up side-sleeping during the night. This is a great pillow, it cradles your head and supports your neck while you sleep. True as advertised, there was no noxious smell when it came out of the bag and after it reinflated it has held its shape well so far. I would like the pillow to be a little thicker though, but that is just personal preference. This pillow is also great for travel as it is smaller than a standard pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has improved the quality of my sleep
reviews.reviewText: I can't say this has made a dramatic difference, but I was starting from a memory foam pillow I like a lot. I used this the last three nights that having it contoured from the beginning makes it immediately comfortable. Over the course of the night, I find it to have a little less cervical support, but still to be quite comfortable. I'm happy to have obtained this one, but I'm not throwing away my previous. In part because I am aware that chair cushions of this nature often don't retain the same level of support six months later. Time will tell with this one, but right now, I'm enjoying it throughout the night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good pillow. Did take a little getting use to but after a few nights I was use to it. It's a little thin for my body but that is a personal issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Funny Shape, Serious Comfort
reviews.reviewText: My SO loves these types of pillows for ergo positioning at night. She uses it on her neck, legs, and in many positions. The different angles help in getting just that right position.I was a big fan of this one, it arrived A-OK and didn't stink. Some new memory foam pillows have a strong chemical stink out of the bag but this one was OK. She LOVES the comfort on this one, it has just the right neck notch (which can also be used between knees for side sleepers) and it's comfy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fall asleep fast!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This pillow is actually pretty amazing. I think it could stand to be a little thicker, maybe at least another inch and a half on it's thickest side, then adjust the slope for their formula or whatever, but it's still great nonetheless.The material has that nice spring-back firmness that's not too weak where you just crush the material every time... no, you bend it, it bends to you, and supports. I laid on it for just a few minutes and felt myself really wanting to shut my eyes and fall all the way asleep! My neck felt great and supported, too.All-in-all, I would recommend this for anyone who has resting issues like me. I would also gift this for someone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, But Not Quite Right for me
reviews.reviewText: The jiaao Contour Memory Foam Pillow promises ergonomic support for various sleeping positions. Upon arrival, I appreciated that it didn’t have the strong odor you often get with memory foam and that it quickly expanded to its full size, thanks to its non-vacuum-sealed packaging.The pillow is exceptionally soft and feels comfortable initially. However, I found it to be too thin for my preference, especially when sleeping on my side. My head felt too low, causing discomfort in my neck. I usually sleep with multiple thin pillows, and while this one alone isn’t sufficient, stacking it with another makes it too high. It's a bit of a Goldilocks situation – the pillow is either too low or too high, but never just right for me. My daughter has already laid claim to it and says it suits her fine - if you have broad shoulders and are a side sleeper this may not be the pillow for you. As a product however I think it is high quality and will likely be great for most users.
